meanings.definition: The process or art of making films.
meanings.sent1: Learning about filmmaking involves understanding camera angles and lighting techniques.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in filmmaking after taking a film class in college.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried its paw at filmmaking by recording the birds outside the window.
meanings.sent4: Her life was a series of twists and turns, each moment a new scene in the grand filmmaking of fate.
meanings.sent5: The magic of filmmaking transported the audience to a different world.

meanings.definition: The activity or occupation of making films.
meanings.sent1: Filmmaking requires creativity, teamwork, and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: He found fulfillment in the fast-paced world of filmmaking.
meanings.sent3: The penguin community organized a filmmaking competition on the icy shores.
meanings.sent4: In the filmmaking of life, we are all both the director and the actor.
meanings.sent5: The art of filmmaking captures moments that last a lifetime.
